Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Actuator rod end play exceeding tolerance. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 06/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
